myopenmath.statement:
Two aircraft are flying at 70 ktas. The Diamond Eclipse has a stall speed of \displaystyle{v}_{{s}}={34}, and the Cessna Stationair has a stall speed of \displaystyle{v}_{{s}}={58}.
The Diamond Eclipse has a maximum load factor that is G's
lower
higher
than that of Cessna Stationair.
Round to 3 decimal places. Note ktas is nm/hr.
